item.description: There are so many amazingly fun and wonderfully weird things happening on Discord, both last week and of course, today. So let’s dive in with a freshly-brewed “cà phê sữa,” of course.

item.title: Weekly Digest #1: What do you stand for?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lock in Your Workspace. Show the World. Our Discord crew is buzzing with energy after our last Friday community call, with folks sharing snapshots of their workspaces.

item.title: Hybrid Working
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves Foundation, we believe in giving you the freedom to work where you’re most productive. While we’re primarily a remote-first company, we recognize the value of in-person collaboration.

item.title: Da Lat Office
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han and the Dwarves team again. We work as a borderless software firm by crafting world-class products that bring great impacts for various industries.

item.title: Places to work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Noise Levels If you’re doing creative work, research suggests you’ll want to be surrounded by ambient noise. A café or co-working space is the perfect choice in this case.

item.title: Where we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Fifty-ish people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.

item.title: Make Remote Working Works
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Being office-present keeps you effective. Firms lean on that. It explains why companies are down to invest a fortune on building creative office with other benefit packages.
